channel.title: Fractize 530 PVP
channel.description:
Client: https://mega.nz/#!yMMQlCTQ!tRYgDQHHIgj5_jMQjFt2H9pHTLQmvarZUZSqCWVILDA Source: https://mega.nz/#!OdNzVaZZ!eRMyoQVtnRGlQOU097F3ssf9YFPI8OuqG6Z9QN1-R64 Cache: https://mega.nz/#!jMsAUS4b!aoY0R0Bv42hHAWg4VBiQHVRZ5LV_0E9tkch6vF71nL4
[b]Client Run.bat code[/b] [code]@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_31\bin\java.exe" -Xmx256m -Xss2m -Dsun.java2d.noddraw=true -XX:+CreateMinidumpOnCrash -XX:CompileThreshold=1500 -Xincgc -XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC -XX:+UseParNewGC -cp bin;./clientlibs.jar; ClientLoader pause[/code]
[B]I release this project bcuz im tired of it it was supposed to be a ArcPKZ remake. I hope someone else will continue to work on it.[/B]
[SIZE=5]You need eclipse to setup the client but i could make you a .bat file if you don't know how to do it.[/SIZE]
[CODE]3 September 2015 Message when you use gfx command so u wont forget what number you used Hunter kit spell Heal group spell You can now autocast with any staff 2 September 2015 Farming stuffs in store Fixed magic in pvp Gnome googles are now equipable Changed prices of pvp arm vesta,zuriel etc Master command only gives 99 combat skills Morrigans javelin and throwing axe is now useable 1 September 2015 Decreased rare rate Magic and Ranged pots to shop Grand exchange teleport Anvils at skilling zone 30 August 2015 Staffs in shop Fight cave teleport Fight pits teleport 29 August 2015 Prices More drops Afk command Added forcechat to kdr command 28 August 2015 Barrelchest anchor attack and defence animation, bonuses and special attack Added altar at home Skilling shop 27 August 2015 Ores at skillzone Trees at skillzone Skill zone teleport 14 August 2015 Donator crown 13 August 2015 Clan wars message if u dont have a clan and trying to set up a clan war More price fixes Made gmaul better Bonus stats to dragon dagger(p+) 11 August 2015 Items in shop doesnt dissapear Spec bar to dds (p+) Clan wars purple portal interface Fixed right click in safepvp Can't teleport above 20 wilderness in safepvp Made ags,dclaws,saradomin sword,vesta spear spec better 10 August 2015 Made dharok a bit better Kdr You can use morrigans javelin/throwing axe Godsword making Ava's accumulator & cap and googles eqipable 9 August 2015 Changed some prices Void is now tradeable Sending a world message when a new player joins Switch command for players Ranging/Mage shop More pvp drops Safe pvp zone in clan wars white portal Dangerous pvp zone in clan wars red portal 8 August 2015 Close interfaces when exit clan wars 5 August 2015 More items to shop Changed color of quest tab text Duel arena Fixed some safe pvp coords 1 August 2015 Clan wars exit portal Clan wars red&white portal Real dh axe holding Players online in quest tab More pvp drops 31 July 2015 Added rock cake Removed the door in the middle of the varrock bank Removed some npcs Fixed auto retaliate 29 July 2015 More pvp drops Donator yell Saradomin sword special attack 28 July 2015 Fixed unsafe pvp zones Ags special delay it was like a gmaul before 26 July 2015 Added special bar to all the godswords 24 July 2015 Master and teleport in quest tab 8 July 2015 Donator shop Main shop Changed respawn to varrock bank Safezone at bank 7 July 2015 Random pvp drops 6 July 2015 Safe pvp in varrock 4 July 2015 Changed home to varrock Changed starter items Home teleport command Master and Setlevel command is not only for admin anymore[/CODE]
[b]Features[/b] Safe pvp at home Random pvp drops No pay2win/vote2win server Quests Custom zones
[img]http://i.imgur.com/jpBgbVx.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/7LooZ3v.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/47e5mXL.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/HNv7mXF.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/tgC6ylh.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/vT6A0h8.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/YytRova.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/mbyAhU9.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Is3QpZu.png[/img]

item.title: Fractize 530 PVP
item.dc:creator: @Project_Runescape Project Runescape
item.description:
@Project_Runescape wrote:

Client: https://mega.nz/#!yMMQlCTQ!tRYgDQHHIgj5_jMQjFt2H9pHTLQmvarZUZSqCWVILDA
Source: https://mega.nz/#!OdNzVaZZ!eRMyoQVtnRGlQOU097F3ssf9YFPI8OuqG6Z9QN1-R64
Cache: https://mega.nz/#!jMsAUS4b!aoY0R0Bv42hHAWg4VBiQHVRZ5LV_0E9tkch6vF71nL4

Client Run.bat code

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_31\bin\java.exe" -Xmx256m -Xss2m -Dsun.java2d.noddraw=true -XX:+CreateMinidumpOnCrash -XX:CompileThreshold=1500 -Xincgc -XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC -XX:+UseParNewGC -cp bin;./clientlibs.jar; ClientLoader pause

I release this project bcuz im tired of it it was supposed to be a ArcPKZ remake.
I hope someone else will continue to work on it.

[SIZE=5]You need eclipse to setup the client but i could make you a .bat file if you don’t know how to do it.[/SIZE]

3 September 2015 Message when you use gfx command so u wont forget what number you used Hunter kit spell Heal group spell You can now autocast with any staff 2 September 2015 Farming stuffs in store Fixed magic in pvp Gnome googles are now equipable Changed prices of pvp arm vesta,zuriel etc Master command only gives 99 combat skills Morrigans javelin and throwing axe is now useable 1 September 2015 Decreased rare rate Magic and Ranged pots to shop Grand exchange teleport Anvils at skilling zone 30 August 2015 Staffs in shop Fight cave teleport Fight pits teleport 29 August 2015 Prices More drops Afk command Added forcechat to kdr command 28 August 2015 Barrelchest anchor attack and defence animation, bonuses and special attack Added altar at home Skilling shop 27 August 2015 Ores at skillzone Trees at skillzone Skill zone teleport 14 August 2015 Donator crown 13 August 2015 Clan wars message if u dont have a clan and trying to set up a clan war More price fixes Made gmaul better Bonus stats to dragon dagger(p+) 11 August 2015 Items in shop doesnt dissapear Spec bar to dds (p+) Clan wars purple portal interface Fixed right click in safepvp Can't teleport above 20 wilderness in safepvp Made ags,dclaws,saradomin sword,vesta spear spec better 10 August 2015 Made dharok a bit better Kdr You can use morrigans javelin/throwing axe Godsword making Ava's accumulator & cap and googles eqipable 9 August 2015 Changed some prices Void is now tradeable Sending a world message when a new player joins Switch command for players Ranging/Mage shop More pvp drops Safe pvp zone in clan wars white portal Dangerous pvp zone in clan wars red portal 8 August 2015 Close interfaces when exit clan wars 5 August 2015 More items to shop Changed color of quest tab text Duel arena Fixed some safe pvp coords 1 August 2015 Clan wars exit portal Clan wars red&white portal Real dh axe holding Players online in quest tab More pvp drops 31 July 2015 Added rock cake Removed the door in the middle of the varrock bank Removed some npcs Fixed auto retaliate 29 July 2015 More pvp drops Donator yell Saradomin sword special attack 28 July 2015 Fixed unsafe pvp zones Ags special delay it was like a gmaul before 26 July 2015 Added special bar to all the godswords 24 July 2015 Master and teleport in quest tab 8 July 2015 Donator shop Main shop Changed respawn to varrock bank Safezone at bank 7 July 2015 Random pvp drops 6 July 2015 Safe pvp in varrock 4 July 2015 Changed home to varrock Changed starter items Home teleport command Master and Setlevel command is not only for admin anymore

Features
Safe pvp at home
Random pvp drops
No pay2win/vote2win server
Quests
Custom zones
